lead_paragraph: Chad Johnson scored on a 9-yard catch for the visiting Cincinnati Bengals in a 44-31 preseason victory against Buffalo. Johnson’s request to put on a show after his score was rejected by an official because of the N.F.L.’s new rules limiting celebrations. J. P. Losman, trying to win the Bills’ quarterback job, finished 7 of 11 passing for 134 yards, but lost two fumbles and threw an interception.
